name: Six F and Six 0 (itch)
description:
A 2D action game that explores and adventures in the black and white world
The hero is somewhere in this world full of strange creatures
Aim to destroy jewels.

By reaching the brain miso room hidden in various places
What happened in this world and the actions taken by a certain person are unraveled in fragments.

○ Basic operation

[←] [→]… Move
[↑] [↓]… Ladder up and down
[↑]… Warp in front of a specific object
[Z]… Jump
[X]… Attack
[↑] [↓] + [X]… Top attack, bottom attack

[Space]… Reduce your physical strength → Suicide (You can return to the starting point when you run out of physical strength)

[F1]… Return to title screen

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
    MINIMUM:
    • OS:7,8,10,11
    • Storage: 40 MB available space
    • 1.5gb ram
    • English language not supported
